note:
a mahayana #buddhist practitioner-philosopher interested in ecological worldviews & ways of knowing beyond the usual binary that divides into ‘us vs. them’ and fuels oppressive power structures.

neurodivergent (#adhd), socially anxious, chronically ill (#mecfs), disabled + housebound. eternally energy depleted. committed to building #community one step at a time.

fields.name: political philosophy
fields.value: the full flourishing of life on earth is not compatible with capitalism.

fields.name: personal geography
fields.value: born in trinidad & tobago; educated in the united states of america; married an englishman. ancestry from west africa (the enslaved) + india & china (the indentured).
